div.l: And with the falle / owte of hir slepe she braid
Helpe holy crosse of Bromholm she said
In manus tuas / lorde to the I calle
A wake Symond / the fende is on̄ me falle
Myn̄ hert is broken / helpe I am but dede
There lieth vpon̄ my wombe and on̄ my hede
Helpe Symkyn for the clerkes fightenfightenfight Line 371 is covered in the same red ink used to highlight initials and top effect the correct to "fighten."
This Iohn stert vp as sone as ever he might
And grasped by the walles / too and froo
To fynde a staff and she stert vp also
And knewe the estris bet than did this Iohn
And by the wall she fonde a staff anon
And sawe a litille shimyring of a light
For at an hole in shoon̄ the mone bright
And by that light / she sawe hem bothe twoo
But sikerly she wist not who was who
But as she sawe a white thyng in here eiȝe
And whan she gan̄ this white thyng aspie
She wende the clerke / had weryd a volipere
And wᵗith the staf she drowe alweye nere ⁊and nere
And wende han hitte this Aleyn̄ at the fulle
And smot the meller / on the pilled skulle
That down̄ he gothe / and cried harrow I deye
Theise clerkes bete hym wele ⁊and lete hym lye
And greythen̄ hem / and toke hir hors anon̄
And eke hir mele / and on̄ hir weye they goon̄
And at the mylle yit they toke hir cake
Of half a busshell of mele / wele I bake
Thus is the proude Miller wele I bete
And hath I loste / the grȳnding of his whete
